name: Nothing Is Eternal
description:
This game is intended as a game about destructive power of Time.

It's a turn-based game.  Every movement to the next cell is the one game move. Every 4 moves the Wave of Time appears, damaging all thing around.

Wooden blocks are destroyed in one wave.

Stone blocks are destroyed in two waves.

You need to collect the keys to open the doors and find out the exit from the level.
